definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
lit. the Zhangs are better off than the Lis (idiom); to gossip about the neighbors
pinyin: Zhang1 jia1 chang2 , Li3 jia1 duan3
dong1 jia1 chang2 xi1 jia1 duan3

sentences.english: However some grownup parents never figure out how to talk to a child.
sentences.chinese: 然而，许多家长怎么也学不会正确地和孩子交谈。

sentences.english: Since hiring more staff for these occasions was costly, the centres needed parents to attend.
sentences.chinese: 由于再雇佣员工将很费钱，这些中心需要家长的参与。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the needs of the families of hearing-impaired children.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解听障儿童家长对康复认知与需求情况。

sentences.english: Sex one-inch colour photos of the students are needed.
sentences.chinese: 需办理接送卡的学生交家长一寸相片2张。

sentences.english: The Taylors are like many American and British parents.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒像许多美国和英国的家长。

sentences.english: Parents should also acknowledge the frightening parts of the disaster when talking with a child about it.
sentences.chinese: 与孩子谈话时，家长应清楚灾难的可怕之处在哪里。

sentences.english: Please enter your 4-digit code to access parental control settings.
sentences.chinese: 请输入访问家长控制设置的4位代码。

sentences.english: Check with your parents before going into a chat room.
sentences.chinese: 进入聊天室之前，先经得家长的同意。

sentences.english: Please complete registration form below and turn into your teacher or PTA .
sentences.chinese: 请详细填写报名表后交给班级老师或家长会。

sentences.english: Is Montessori right for your child?
sentences.chinese: 心田儿童之家致家长的一封信。

sentences.english: If you need to add or drop a class, please come to the office to see Ms Lu.
sentences.chinese: 需要办理加退选的家长请到办公室找吕惠中。

sentences.english: The Education Department said coaching was 'a private matter for parents'.
sentences.chinese: 州教育部说补习是家长们私人的事务。

sentences.english: Event1: How to avoid costly mistakes when applying for College Financial Aid?
sentences.chinese: 您想避免多数家长申请大学资助的错误吗？

sentences.english: So sons legally were still under their paterfamilias.
sentences.chinese: 所以法律上儿子仍属于他们的家长。

sentences.english: Orangutan mothers face up to eight years of single parenthood raising their infants.
sentences.chinese: 猩猩母亲则要做长达八年的独自养育幼儿的单亲家长。

sentences.english: Parent with child (age 0-4) is required to assist in child care service on rotation basis.
sentences.chinese: 零至四岁的家长请协助轮流看顾小孩服务。

definition: a dad (father of a young child)
a mom (mother of a young child)
teacher in charge of a class
